about_the_game:
EN

Main description:

A shy girl and a school party — can this work out? Step into the shoes of Akira, a teenager whose dream is supported by a mysterious force. Make friends, build relationships, and fight to make your dreams come true!

What will you do to fulfill your dreams? Akira, an ordinary teenager who loves Asia, enters a competition to create a school festival. Get to know other students and their secrets, convince them to help you, and create the best convention!

Detail description:

"Akira Making Fest Together" is a visual novel that tells the story of Akira's life. Step into the role of a teenage weeb who loves Asian culture. One day, she is visited by a "voice" that helps her gain confidence. By chance, she decides to organize a school festival celebrating Asian culture. But how can she achieve this when she has always shyly stood on the sidelines?

Akira's story is about her journey, but also about us. It shows that anyone can fulfill their dreams, as long as they have the strength to fight for them.

Make Friends

In Making Fest Together, you can't do everything on your own. Nurture your relationships with the people you meet at school and let their talents blossom!

Prove that your idea is the best

You're not the only one with dreams to fulfill. Make sure your idea is recognized as the best! Other students also want to organize their own events—they will do everything they can to win!

School life

You're a high school student, so you'll experience typical teenage challenges:

relationships with other people,

feelings of exclusion,

lack of self-confidence,

struggling for good grades,

school romances...

and much more!

Plan Your Time

Your day isn't elastic! You'll need to balance your time between studying, sleep, rest, school, and organizing the festival. Don’t feel like studying? Your grades will be too low to pull off the event!

Minigames

In Akira, you'll also find minigames that influence your progress in the story.

Easter Eggs and References

As fans of manga and anime, we've added references to various series. Can you catch them all?

Story of the game

Akira Making Fest Together is, in a way, a story about ourselves. We often lack the courage to take action, and life seems to work against us. But one small change can give us the chance to transform our entire lives. Will it be a dream, a person met in the hallway, or something else?

Without commitment, you cannot taste the flavor of life. ~ J. Walkiewicz
